nodes.text: Garu's Warblade was an ancient Sith warblade that belonged to the Sith Lord Garu and was made by the Sith alchemist and magician Tritos Nal. The sword was stolen from Nal's workshop on Korriz by agents of Garu's rival, the Sith Lord known as the Patron, and was eventually broken into pieces and scattered across the Esstran sector by the time of the Cold War.
